title: *** EUNUCH ***
text:
Eunuch? Nah, Unique! Eunuch will catch your attention more easily, didn't it?
Those who don't know what eunuch means won't answer my ad!
+++++++++++++
I have written an ad claiming that I am unique, but I didn't really explain why I was unique, I just described myself. Here I will lay out what makes me unique, or at least very unusual.
I am Mensa+-smart, which does not make me unique, just statistically rare.
For my height, 5'9", I am 5-10 lbs. over an IDEAL weight, at 155 lbs. Again, not unique just rare (in THIS obese country anyhow).
I am a night person. Try as I may I can't seem to get to sleep before 2am. I often get more than 8 hours of sleep, because I am retired and I don't have to get out of bed for anyone. But even if I am up at 7am, I am never tired during the day. I am an Energizer Bunny who works out at the gym rarely but miraculously stays fit. I'd love to have want a Yoga partner.
The best part of most days is my shower, a hot and wet indulgent shower. The worst part of the day is getting out of the hot shower into the cold ambient air. I get over it quickly enough.
The worst and unhappiest fact in my life is something so embarrassing and painful that I won't talk about it until I trust you. And the fact that I do not have a regular woman in my life.
If I like what I see I may seem EASY. I am the least EASY man you have ever met. I say that with a grimace.
I do not OWN a TV, a television set. I have not owned a TV set, except for my 15 years of marriage, since I was 20, since college. I listen to the radio, and my home radio and my car radio are both "stuck" on C-SPAN, political news all day long, with no partisan spin. And I handle silence pretty well as my inner chatter is creative. When C-SPAN gets boring, or sometimes when I have heard that program earlier that day, I turn to WGTS, a Christian music station. What is interesting about that is that I was raised Christian, I stopped identifying as Christian when I turned 18, I have 100% Jewish blood, I "became" Jewish in my late 20's, years after dismissing the Biblical God as a fairy tale on a par with Santa Claus. I am a Reform Jew / flaming atheist with "spiritual" tendencies (part of what I mean by this is that science is not the only path to knowledge or wisdom or bliss and some things need never be "known" or understood, mystery is good).
I am in my second career, as political writer (a book and a blog). I keep getting better.
I love to read. But I am a slow reader (250wpm?) and I do not read much on any given day, rarely as much as an hour. But I am persistent and consistent and so I have read 50 books / year for decades. Only 20% of my reading is fiction; my big categories are history, economics, current affairs, science and philosophy. I toss any book after a few pages if the author doesn't engage me. Most authors don't write anywhere as well as I do.
I stopped smoking after 22 years of real smoking (nearly 2 packs / day) (people who smoke 5-10 cigarettes / day are not addicted). I do have heart disease but it is under control, as I can do anything except run for distance (I can "fast-dance" for forever if I am courting you, or just showing off. I am still a Coke addict (the brown-bubbles drink!).
I am an impatient SOB. If we get into an email conversation and I don't hear back from you as quickly as the last time, I am liable to get annoyed. OTOH, if I know that you will be away and incommunicado for a week, I am as patient as Job. I would probably do prison time well if I knew exactly how long I had to do time, if I didn't I'd go nuts within an hour.
I enjoy criticism, I learn from it and I don't care if you meant me harm when you said why I am a screw-up, I will learn something from it (if only that you are not a good judge of character). I hope you are OK with corrections too. If you ever say "anyways" I will give you a look that will make you cringe. And yeah, even if I know you are doing it to get my goat.
I once drove cross-country (5 days, mostly alone) with no radio in the car. That seems to amaze people more than anything else I have ever laid claim to.
(Arrogant moment on the way). I THINK, all the time. I am convinced that most humans -- or maybe most Americans -- go their eternal rest without thinking for a whole minute in their entire lives. So, for those of you who have a problem with Darwinian Evolution, most humans are no more "evolved" than an average chimpanzee. Those of you who don't think will never see me as anything but ordinary.
My politics are far Left-Wing (those who have my political philosophy include: FDR, Paul Wellstone, Bernie Sanders, and none of them are socialists). I am not happy with our President, I am prepared to be very unhappy with HRC, and I have not pulled a lever for a Republican since the Dixiecrats (white Southern racists of the 1960's and before) all turned Republican. title: The Most Attractive Thing About A Person Is Their Heart & Soul. . ..
text:
The Most Attractive Thing About A Person Is Their Heart & Soul. . ..
Hello, I thought I would give this internet dating a whirl, albeit I am pretty engrossed in work these days. I am a very open-minded, energetic, warm-hearted, and driven individual. I believe when you look past ethnicity and race that the only thing that makes us different from one another is our family and culture. Therefore, based on my respect and tolerance for others, I am open to meeting and/or dating anyone who is kind-hearted, open-minded, and not afraid to have fun and try new things. I love to travel and be around nature (e.g., lakes, water, beaches, and the ocean) as well as enjoying the tranquility and solace from walking on the beach.
